price: Na siku atakapo waita na akasema: Wako wapi hao mlio kuwa mkidai kuwa ni washirika wangu?
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ أَيۡنَ شُرَكَآءِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمۡ تَزۡعُمُونَ
footnotes: Na pia, ewe Mtume, kumbuka siku watapo itwa washirikina na Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu kwa wito wa kuwatahayarisha, wakaambiwa: Wako wapi washirika ambao mkidai kuwa ni miungu wa kukunusuruni, au waombezi wa kukuombeeni?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunādīhim fayaqūlu ayna shurakāiya alladhīna kuntum tazʿumūna
